response.overview: Dancing with devils It is a dramatic film that simulates the struggle between good and evil to achieve justice. However, justice disappears in some situations in the film’s story, and the characters of good and evil mix, forming a woven fabric with the utmost excitement that the film’s characters show of their desire for power and love of the presidency. There is no mystery without a solution. You can see from Is it the character of the Devil, and who is his opponent, who competes with him in power, or who is chasing him?
response.tagline: In modern Iraq, high-ranking officers are involved in cases outside the law, and they search for the unknown personality of the Devil and seek the help of a hired killer nicknamed the Wolf, but he turns against them.
response.title: Develio
